statements: DELETE FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND equipment_type = 'Computer';
DELETE FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock <= 5 AND equipment_name LIKE '%Mouse%';
DELETE FROM camera_inventory WHERE price > 2000 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM lens_inventory WHERE brand = 'Nikon' AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Lens WHERE lens_id = 2 AND brand = 'Nikon';
DELETE FROM lighting_accessories WHERE brand = 'XYZ' AND power_rating > 50.0;
DELETE FROM cameras WHERE price > 1500 AND resolution < 20;
